      • checkDigits

        public boolean checkDigits(StringBuffer buf,
                           Scanner scanner,
                           String min,
                           String max)
                    throws IOException
        Check the digits of a buffer.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer
        scanner - The scanner
        min - For negative values only. Inclusive.
        max - For positive values only. Inclusive.
        Returns:
        true if the number is in the expected range, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - When an I/O error occurs.
